title: Payday 2 (full game) latest update 44 (1.17.0) + all DLC's; tunn
description:
Hello. this is the payday 2 (full game) latest update 44 (1.17.0) + all DLC's; tunngle ready.

I stopped uploading games with steam cracks - it's for your own safety and joy. The tunngle version is getting more attractive and less crashing. (everyone who haved steam saves will have to download additional crack. Who used tunngle - installing this will be a peace of cake.

Use b1 archiever to extract the files: http://b1.org

So there are few steps you need to do if you want to play online without crashing or "joining forever" stuff:

1. Extract payday 2 folder wherever you want.
2. Open it and open file named profile.ini (you can open it with a notepad)
3. Find a line with "augeacc35" and change it to your prefered nickname.
4. Save the file.
5. Do same changes for 2 more files - xyz.dat and SmartSteamEmu. (note: nickname must be same in all the files)
6. Try to run the game - LAN only! If it doesn't show your nickname recheck all 3 files and change nickname again, but this time put a check on read only area in each file's properties.
7. Install tunngle and create a free accaunt (if you haven't done this yet).
8. Join public looby named "payday 2 10.x.x.x" (probably will crash) or join private networks - name: payday 2, no password or - name: augeacc35, no password.
9. Play online! Enjoy...

There is a site where you can download the updates: http://www.tunngle.net/wiki/Network:PAYDAY_2

If you are having any problems please post them on this torrent.

-augeacc35, 2014
